Case 22-1426, Document 78, 06/29/2023, 3536039, Page90 of 217
SA-344
Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 204-3 Filed 04/16/21 Page 344 of 348
By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/30/07
By:
A. MARIE VILLAFANA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
Dated:
JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated:
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ.
COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: 10-29-07
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN
DOJ-OGR-00021520

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of an addendum to a non-prosecution agreement involving Jeffrey Epstein. The document contains signatures and handwritten dates. The overall quality of the scan is good, with clear text and signatures.
